ComicInfo.Summary:
Continuing the CREED saga under the Creative Direction of Michael B. Jordan. Amara will fight by any means necessary, even if it means going to someone forbidden-someone who lived in the shadow of her grandfather, Apollo Creed. Will she have what it takes to pass the rigorous test of her new trainer, and navigate the wounds of her familyâ€™s past?
